check-email: Check your email to complete the creation of your account!
join-request-sent: Your join request has been sent to the tournament admin!
already-request-sent: You already sent a request to join this tournament. Please wait or contact the tournament admin to be approved.
request-rejected: You have been rejected to join this tournament and cannot try to join again
not-tournament-yet: You are not in any tournament yet! Look for a tournament in the search bar or create your own
htp-1: You will be able to complete the predict a match score before it begins. Do not forget to click SAVE PREDICTIONS to update the results
htp-2: Suspended/Cancelled/Postponed matches in leagues will not be considered.
htp-3: If you hit the winner or draw, you will get 1 point. If you get the exact outcome, you will get 3 points. 0 points if you miss the outcome
htp-4: The ranking is based on total points. In case of a tie, the user with more exact outcomes will be ranked higher. In case of matching points and exact outcomes, the registration date in the app will be considered (the one who joined first will be higher)
htp-5: You can create as many tournaments and join as many as you like
permission-media-required: Permission to access media library is required
add-tournament-description: Add a description for your tournament (optional)
couldnt-send-reset-email: Could not send password reset email.
check-email-password-link: Check your email for a password reset link.
create-tournament-tapping-button: Create a tournament by tapping the button below
ads-not-loaded: Ads not loaded, try again in a few seconds
left-review: Left us a review and get {{coins}} coins!
hiw-1-description: Between Europe, America, Asia or Africa.
hiw-2-description: The exact result before the start or the match.
hiw-3-description: And redeem coins beating players all around the world.
hiw-5-description: Challenge your friends and prove you have more football knowledge.
compete-with-friends: Compete with friends and fans all around the world in the most complete football predictions game.
users-download-and-access:
Users can download and access 
 directly from the mobile app
compete-predict-climb: Compete with friends, Predict results and Climb the Leaderboard
you-havent-saved: You haven't saved your predictions yet
all-prizes-free: All prizes are FREE. They are available for you to earn without investing a dime. The prizes are sent to most COUNTRIES of the world through local stores (Spain, Mexico, Argentina, Uruguay, Chile, Ecuator, United States, Colombia, etc.) without any surcharge for shipping or taxes.
prize-claimed-successfully: Prize claimed successfully! We'll get in touch soon
invite-new-members: Invite new members with your link! Both will get 5000 coins when they register, plus 10% of their earnings from leagues and rounds
no-members-yet: You have not invited any member yet
share-referral-link: Share your referral link to start winning rewards
hero-subtitle: The ultimate football prediction platform. Create your pool, invite friends and prove who knows more about football.
how-it-works-subtitle: Start predicting in minutes. No complications, no hidden costs.
landing-step-1-desc: Create your free account in less than 30 seconds and join the community.
landing-step-2-desc: Predict the results of matches from your favorite leagues.
landing-step-3-desc: Climb the rankings and compete against friends and other users.
landing-step-4-desc: The best predictors win exclusive prizes every season.
leagues-subtitle: Predict results from the most exciting competitions in world football.
more-leagues-coming: And many more leagues coming soon...
features-subtitle: A complete platform designed for true football fans.
feature-private-groups-desc: Create private tournaments and compete only with your friends, family or coworkers.
feature-stats-desc: Analyze your performance with complete statistics and improve your predictions.
feature-notifications-desc: Receive alerts before each match so you never forget to make your prediction.
feature-responsive-desc: Play from any device. The experience is perfect on mobile or desktop.
feature-secure-desc: Your data is protected with the best security technology available.
feature-game-modes-desc: Choose between exact result prediction, winner, or goal totals.
cta-subtitle: Join thousands of users already enjoying the thrill of predicting. It's free and only takes 30 seconds.
cta-disclaimer: No credit card Â· Cancel anytime
winners-contacted-by-email: Winners will be contacted by email
unpaid-round-warning: Your predictions will not count until you pay for this round. Once the round starts, you cannot pay to play it
